timeline.bodyText: is this H2 specific syntax or is this supposed to be standard SQL?
timeline.author: sophokles73

replies.bodyText:
Good point! I did some further research and it turned out that it is actual T-SQL specific (https://docs.microsoft.com/de-de/sql/t-sql/functions/isnull-transact-sql?view=sql-server-ver15).
I wasn't aware that H2 supports anything beyond ANSI SQL at all.
COALESCE is ANSI SQL hence it makes sense to use COALESCE here as well in my opinion.
replies.author: fkaltner

timeline.message:
Review suggestions:
- Switching to COALESCE for H2

Signed-off-by: Florian Kaltner <florian.kaltner@bosch.io>
